ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at Quickstrike and followed him. The closer they got to Megatron s base, the more nervous she got. Quickstrike, You don t suppose it a a trap?

::DarkMouse::

She looked at Quickstrike and followed him. The closer they got to 
Megatron's base, the more nervous she got. "Quickstrike, You don't 
suppose it'a a trap? Do you?  I just have the overriding feeling of 
wanting to turn and run.  I'll follow you to the pit, but I got a bad 
feeling about this."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike: 
> 
> "Me neither," Quickstrike replied to Dark Mouse. He thought, too, 
> something was up. Why did Black Arachnia want them to go to the 
> Predacon cave? The last time he knew, she was against Megatron. 
> 
> He shook his head and started off to the coordinates Black Arachnia 
> gave him. "Why in tarnation would sugar-bot want us t' meet back up 
> wit' Megatron?" He had his head low to the ground, with his tail 
> tightly curled over his back.
